dict.acceptation: （使）急速行进，仓促完成；猛攻；急速流动，奔腾；
突袭；（使）仓促行事；催促；（为物色、招募目的）特别关注；
冲；匆忙；繁忙的活动；涌动；

sent.orig: Forearm intramedullary nails included Rush pins, Street pins, Sage pins, and so on.
sent.trans: 尺桡骨骨折的髓内钉治疗包括具有代表性的Rush钉、Street钉、Sage钉等。

sent.orig: His rush to return home, got on the ropes and rush rushed to market.
sent.trans: 他急急忙忙地返回家中，拿了小绳又急急忙忙赶往集市。

sent.orig: The meal over, guests rush away. They rush away precipitously, as if they feared a plague.
sent.trans: 饭一吃完客人们便匆匆忙忙走了，他们仓皇逃走，仿佛怕瘟疫降临。

sent.orig: I will lead China Football rush out of Asia, rush to the world!
sent.trans: 请翻译成英语：我将带领中国足球冲出亚洲，冲向世界！

sent.orig: During every year's rush-harvest and rush-planting, the garrison here comes to help.
sent.trans: 每年的双抢时候，驻扎此地的战士们都会来帮忙。
